statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, location FROM traffic_incidents WHERE number_of_injuries > 0;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, location, date_occurred FROM traffic_incidents WHERE number_of_fatalities > 0;
SELECT location, date_occurred FROM traffic_incidents WHERE number_of_injuries IS NULL;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, location, number_of_injuries FROM traffic_incidents ORDER BY number_of_injuries DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, location, date_occurred, number_of_injuries FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident' ORDER BY date_occurred DESC, number_of_injuries DESC;
SELECT incident_id, location, number_of_injuries FROM traffic_incidents WHERE number_of_injuries > 5 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT incident_type, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM traffic_incidents GROUP BY incident_type ORDER BY total_incidents DESC;
SELECT location, SUM(number_of_injuries) AS total_injuries, SUM(number_of_fatalities) AS total_fatalities FROM traffic_incidents GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_injuries DESC, total_fatalities DESC;

SELECT incident_id, incident_type, location, date_occurred FROM traffic_incidents WHERE date_occurred BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND incident_type IN ('Collision', 'Road Closure') ORDER BY incident_type, date_occurred DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Crash';
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM traffic_accidents WHERE accident_type = 'Collision' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT incident_type, location FROM traffic_incidents WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp < '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT id, location, accident_type FROM traffic_accidents WHERE is_fatal = TRUE LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM traffic_incidents ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, location, incident_type, timestamp FROM traffic_incidents WHERE location='Los Angeles' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type='Accident' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, location, accident_type FROM traffic_accidents WHERE is_fatal=true ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT id, location, accident_type, timestamp FROM traffic_accidents WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY accident_type ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type='Road Closure' AND timestamp > '2022-02-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents;
SELECT incident_type, location FROM traffic_incidents WHERE id = 3;
SELECT time, incident_type FROM traffic_incidents ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT id, incident_type, location FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident';
SELECT id, name, role FROM personnel ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident';
SELECT id, incident_type, location FROM traffic_incidents ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT * FROM accident_details WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT location, time FROM traffic_incidents WHERE location LIKE '%Highway%';
SELECT p.name AS Person, p.role AS Role, ti.incident_type AS Incident FROM personnel p INNER JOIN traffic_incidents ti ON p.id = ti.id;
SELECT * FROM TrafficIncidents;
SELECT incident_id, location, reported_time FROM TrafficIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident';
SELECT reported_by, report_description FROM AccidentReports ORDER BY report_date DESC, report_time ASC;
SELECT name, position FROM Personnel WHERE department = 'Operations' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT incident_id, personnel_id, response_time FROM IncidentResponse WHERE incident_id = 101 ORDER BY response_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident' ORDER BY reported_time DESC;
SELECT TrafficIncidents.location, AccidentReports.report_date, AccidentReports.report_time FROM TrafficIncidents JOIN AccidentReports ON TrafficIncidents.incident_id = AccidentReports.incident_id;
SELECT Personnel.name, Personnel.position, IncidentResponse.response_time FROM Personnel JOIN IncidentResponse ON Personnel.personnel_id = IncidentResponse.personnel_id;

SELECT TrafficIncidents.location, IncidentResponse.response_time, IncidentResponse.response_description FROM IncidentResponse JOIN TrafficIncidents ON IncidentResponse.incident_id = TrafficIncidents.incident_id;

SELECT TrafficIncidents.location, IncidentResponse.response_time, Personnel.name FROM IncidentResponse JOIN Personnel ON IncidentResponse.personnel_id = Personnel.personnel_id JOIN TrafficIncidents ON IncidentResponse.incident_id = TrafficIncidents.incident_id ORDER BY IncidentResponse.response_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT id, location, date FROM accidents WHERE location = 'Highway';
SELECT name, rank FROM personnel ORDER BY rank DESC;
SELECT vehicle_model, license_plate FROM vehicles WHERE owner_id = 123;
SELECT head, contact FROM departments WHERE name = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY date DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT description, location FROM accidents WHERE id IN (1, 5, 8) AND driver_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT name, rank, department FROM personnel WHERE department = 'Security' ORDER BY name;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, license_plate FROM vehicles WHERE owner_id = 1001;
SELECT name, location, head FROM departments WHERE contact LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY name ASC;
